Home.Title: Authentic Muslim Adhkar
Home.Titledisc: Translated into twenty languages other than Arabic. The translation was done by referring to Islamic sources translated into these languages. We have made every effort to perfect the translations, and since human work is subject to imperfection, especially as computer fonts may not serve the purpose 100%, we kindly request feedback regarding the translation to be sent to the attached Telegram ID. Share the reward and don't withhold from your Muslim brothers around the world any observation that improves the translation.
Home.TitleHomePage: Translated into twenty languages other than Arabic. The translation was done by referring to Islamic sources translated into these languages. We have made every effort to perfect the translations, and since human work is subject to imperfection, especially as computer fonts may not serve the purpose 100%, we kindly request feedback regarding the translation to be sent to the attached Telegram ID. Share the reward and don't withhold from your Muslim brothers around the world any observation that improves the translation.

about.aboutimg: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest
about.aboutmasigefoll: We strive to facilitate access for Muslims around the world to daily adhkar in their native languages, while maintaining the accuracy of meanings and the spirit of the original texts.
about.aboutli3: Ability to listen to adhkar audio
about.aboutappdisc: Get the Adhkar app on your phone for quick access anytime, anywhere.
about.aboutcotshindesc: We rely on trusted sources and authentic hadith books in selecting adhkar, with review by specialized scholars.
about.aboutcotshin11: Yes, the app is completely free and available to everyone. We aim to spread goodness without charge.
about.aboutcotshin2: How can I contribute to the translation?
about.aboutcotshin22: We welcome contributions to the translation. You can contact us through the Contact Us page for more information on how to participate.
about.aboutdisc: Help us spread adhkar and remind others of the virtue of remembering Allah.

contact.CardDescription: We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
